text: The Peugeot 508 is a car produced by Peugeot since 2010. It replaced both the smaller Peugeot 407 and the larger Peugeot 607. It got facelifted in 2015 and received a new generation in 2018. == Engines == * 1.6 VTi 85 kW (115 hp) and 88 kW (120 hp) * 1.6 THP 110 kW (150 hp) and 115 kW (156 hp) * 1.6 HDi 82 kW (112 hp) * 2.0 HDi 103 kW (140 hp) and 120 kW (163 hp) * 2.2 HDi 150 kW (204 hp) 508 Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Peugeot 508
